bf_htab_stats_t Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Statistics (counters) for the buffer-manager hash table.

This structure holds counters specific to the buffer-manager's hash table. Although it is not necessary, they are separated from the rest for ease of unit-testing.
